text: upright Ceroplesis poggei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Harold in 1878. It is known from Angola, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, the Republic of the Congo, Mozambique, Uganda, Tanzania, Zimbabwe, and Zambia.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis poggei. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Ceroplesis poggei malepicta Fairmaire, 1882 * Ceroplesis poggei poggei Harold, 1878 ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1878
title: Ceroplesis poggei
